original_title: Bolshoi Ballet: The Legend Of Love
overview: This splendid tale of forbidden love, self-sacrifice, jealousy and suffering returns to the Bolshoi stage after a ten-year absence. The Legend of Love is one of Russian master Yuri Grigorovichâ€™s earliest choreographic works, and its storyline explores the conflict between love and duty through its two heroines.
title: Bolshoi Ballet: The Legend Of Love
